result_list.explanation: Il tire un Papier. This stage direction describes a character's interaction with an object (a paper), so it fits into the object category.

result_list.explanation: Il continue à chanter. This stage direction describes the delivery manner (continuing to sing), so it fits into the delivery category.
Il entre chez lui. This stage direction describes a character exiting the stage (entering his home), so it fits into the exit category.
